post_title: SOSA Archers - Southern Okanagan Sportsmen's Association
post_content:
Elevate your shooting skills at **SOSA Archers**, the premier destination for **archery in Oliver, British Columbia**. As a division of the Southern Okanagan Sportsmen's Association (SOSA), our club offers a comprehensive dual-facility experience for archers of all disciplines. We feature a high-quality **indoor archery range** at the Air Cadet Building for winter practice and an expansive **outdoor archery range** at 352 Sportsmen's Bowl Road, accessible 365 days a year. Whether you are a fan of **compound and recurve bows** or utilize a **crossbow** in our designated shooting areas, SOSA provides the perfect environment for year-round mastery.

We are deeply committed to the future of the sport, hosting a highly active **Junior Olympian Program (JOP)** every Thursday evening to develop young competitive shooters. Our facility is uniquely equipped with dedicated broadhead pits and specialized crossbow butts, making us the top choice for both recreational target practice and **archery training in the South Okanagan**. With affordable annual memberships and a focus on safety and technique, SOSA Archers fosters a vibrant and inclusive community. Visit us today to experience the best of **indoor and outdoor shooting in BC!**
business_hours: Outdoor: 8AM-9PM; Indoor: Mon & Thu nights (from 6 PM)
range_length_yards: Outdoor: Crossbow butt, Broadhead pit, target butts; Indoor: Air Cadet Bldg
lesson_price_range: Certified NCCP Coaches; JOP Youth Program (Thu)

post_address: 1245 Chattell Rd (Henry Range); 1979 Dorman Rd (Dorman Range)
post_content:
Discover the premier archery experience on Central Vancouver Island with **Arrowsmith Archers**, a division of the **Parksville-Qualicum Fish & Game Association**. Our club offers a comprehensive year-round shooting experience, featuring a professional **indoor archery range** at Nanoose Pentecostal Camp during the winter months (September – May) and two exceptional **outdoor archery ranges** (Henry Range and Dorman Range) for the summer season. Whether you are a fan of high-performance **compound bows**, traditional **recurve bows**, or utilize a **crossbow** in our designated shooting areas, Arrowsmith Archers provides the perfect setting to hone your skills.

We are deeply committed to youth development, hosting a highly active **Junior Olympian Program (JOP)** and providing expert coaching led by certified instructors during our indoor sessions. With affordable annual memberships and accessible equipment rentals, we are the top choice for **archery training in Parksville and the surrounding communities**. Join our vibrant community today to enjoy professional facilities and expert guidance in a supportive atmosphere. Visit us at Arrowsmith Archers and experience the best of **indoor and outdoor shooting in BC!**
business_hours: Indoor: Mon/Wed 6:00-8:00 PM; Outdoor: 9:00 AM-8:00 PM (Summer)
lesson_price_range: Certified Coaches at indoor sessions; JOP Youth Program

post_title: Penticton Archery Club / Penticton Shooting Sports
post_content:
Discover the premier archery experience in the South Okanagan at **Penticton Archery Club**, a vital part of **Penticton Shooting Sports** in **Penticton, British Columbia**. Our facility at 1787 Highway 97 offers a comprehensive dual-range system designed to accommodate archers of all skill levels throughout the year. During the winter months, sharpen your accuracy in our professional **indoor 20-yard archery range**, while our expansive **outdoor range** provides targets from 20 to 70 yards for a true summer challenge.

Whether you shoot a **compound, recurve, or traditional bow**, Penticton Archery Club provides a supportive and social environment for practice. We host regular shooting sessions on Wednesday evenings and Saturday afternoons, making it easy to integrate archery into your weekly routine. With affordable annual memberships and a low **drop-in fee of just $5.00** for non-members, we are the most accessible choice for **archery training in Penticton**. Join our community today to enjoy professional facilities and friendly, informal guidance as you master the bow. Visit us and experience the best of **indoor and outdoor shooting in the Okanagan!**
lesson_price_range: Informal assistance for beginners; no formal structured lessons listed

post_content:
Discover the premier year-round archery experience at **Silvertip Archers - Indoor Range**, the focal point for **archery in Prince George, British Columbia**. Located at 835 Central St W, our facility provides a professional **indoor 18m archery range** designed to help archers of all specialties hone their skills. We take pride in offering our members unparalleled convenience with **24/7 key access** from 6:30 AM to 11 PM daily, ensuring you can practice on your own schedule.

Silvertip Archers is deeply committed to the growth of the sport, hosting a highly active **Junior Olympian Program (JOP)** and specialized **Tuesday Development Nights**. For those new to the bow, we offer popular Friday night drop-in sessions for just $5.00, providing an affordable entry point into the world of **archery in Northern BC**. Whether you shoot a **compound, recurve, or traditional bow**, our club provides a supportive community and expert-led **archery training in Prince George**. Join us today and experience the best of indoor shooting!
business_hours: Indoor: 6:30 AM - 11 PM daily; Outdoor: 8 AM - sunset (members)
lesson_price_range: JOP Program; Tuesday Development Night; Lessons available (contact for pricing)

post_content:
Experience the great outdoors and sharpen your precision at **Silvertip Archers - Outdoor**, the premier destination for **archery in Prince George, British Columbia**. Located at 6390 Trans-Canada Hwy, our expansive facility offers a diverse shooting experience with both dedicated **target and field ranges**. Operating from 8:00 AM until sunset, our outdoor range provides a tranquil and professional environment for members to practice their skills in the fresh air of Northern BC.

As a cornerstone of **archery in the Peace region**, Silvertip Archers caters to all disciplines, including **compound, recurve, and traditional bows**. Our outdoor facility is designed for variety, featuring a challenging **3D archery course** and field loops that simulate real-world shooting conditions. While our outdoor range is for experienced archers who own their own equipment, we foster a vibrant community through regular club shoots and competitive events. With comprehensive annual memberships that include access to our indoor range, we are the top choice for **archery training in Prince George**. Visit us today to take your shooting to the next level in the heart of nature!

post_content:

post_title: Richmond Rod and Gun Club - Indoor Archery Range
post_content:
Experience top-tier indoor shooting at **Richmond Rod and Gun Club - Indoor Archery Range**, the premier destination for **archery in Richmond, British Columbia**. Conveniently located at 7400 River Rd, our facility offers a professional environment for archers of all specialties to hone their skills. We pride ourselves on being an inclusive club where **all bow types are welcome**, including compound, recurve, traditional, and even crossbows.

Whether you are a seasoned shooter or a complete beginner, we offer flexible access through our scheduled **indoor drop-in nights** on Mondays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays from 7:30 PM to 9:30 PM. For those new to the sport, our highly acclaimed **Beginner Archery Lessons** on Monday nights provide a comprehensive foundation for just $40, including all necessary gear. With affordable drop-in rates and specialized equipment rentals available, we are the top choice for **archery training in the Lower Mainland**. Join our vibrant community today and enjoy expert guidance in a supportive atmosphere. Visit Richmond Rod and Gun Club to take your aim to the next level!
business_hours: Mon/Wed/Thu/Fri 7:30 PM - 9:30 PM
lesson_price_range: Beginner Lessons ($40 including gear; Mondays)
bow_types_allowed: All bow types (Compound, Recurve, Traditional, Crossbow)

post_content:
Experience the excitement of precision shooting at **Gum Ying Richmond Archery Club**, the premier destination for **indoor archery in Richmond, British Columbia**. Conveniently located at 4221 Shell Rd, our facility boasts one of the largest **indoor archery ranges in BC**, with enough space to accommodate up to 70 people and 24 simultaneous shooting spots. Whether you are a fan of **recurve, compound, or traditional longbows**, our professional range is designed to provide a safe and controlled environment for archers of all specialties.

At Gum Ying, we are dedicated to making the sport accessible through expert-led **archery lessons in Richmond**. We offer comprehensive **Introductory Sessions** for beginners, engaging **Family Sessions**, and a highly competitive **Junior Olympian Program (JOP)** for young aspiring archers. With flexible operating hours six days a week and affordable hourly rates, we are the top choice for recreational and competitive **archery training in the Lower Mainland**. Join our vibrant community today to learn from certified instructors and improve your accuracy!
business_hours: Tue-Fri 3:30-8:15 PM; Sat 9:30 AM-6:15 PM; Sun 1:30-6:15 PM; Mon 3:30-6 PM
lesson_price_range: Intro Session ($35); Family Session ($70); JOP ($666.75)

Elevate your outdoor shooting experience with **West Kootenay Archers**, the premier destination for **archery in Trail, British Columbia**. Based at the stunning Casino Range and managed in partnership with the Trail Wildlife Association, our club offers an unparalleled environment for **target and 3D archery**. Our facility features three distinct outdoor 3D courses, each with 15 targets, set in a beautiful natural landscape that provides both a challenge and a serene escape for shooters of all skill levels.

Whether you favor the power of a **compound bow** or the heritage of **traditional archery**, West Kootenay Archers provides a supportive community for all enthusiasts. We specialize in hosting exciting event-based drop-in sessions and managed shoots that showcase the best of **outdoor shooting in the West Kootenays**. With access available from dawn until dusk and affordable membership options through the TWA, we are the top choice for **archery training in the Trail region**. Join us today to explore our scenic trails and sharpen your accuracy in the heart of nature!

Discover the vibrant spirit of **archery in Vancouver** with **UBC Archers**, based at the University of British Columbia. Primarily located in the Osborne Building at 6108 Thunderbird Boulevard, our club is open to students, alumni, and the local community. We offer a professional **indoor archery range** experience during the winter terms, providing a focused environment for shooters of all skill levels. Whether you are a seasoned expert or a curious beginner, UBC Archers is the perfect place to hone your accuracy with **recurve, compound, or traditional bows**.

At UBC Archers, we believe in making the sport educational and accessible. Our structured sessions include expert-led **beginner archery lessons**, ensuring that new archers build a solid foundation in safety and technique. With affordable term-based memberships for students and competitive rates for alumni and community members, we are the leading choice for **archery training at UBC**. Join our diverse and welcoming community today to enjoy high-quality facilities and expert guidance in the heart of the Vancouver campus. Visit us and experience the precision of the bow!

post_content:
Step into the world of ancient marksmanship at **Lykopis Archery**, Vancouver's premier school for **traditional and historical archery**. Located in the heart of the city at 2180 Main St, our boutique **indoor archery range** specializes in the art of the longbow, recurve, and various historical shooting styles. Unlike modern target ranges, Lykopis offers a unique cultural and athletic experience, focusing on instinctive shooting and the rich heritage of the bow.

Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned practitioner, we provide comprehensive **archery lessons in Vancouver**, including highly sought-after introductory workshops and ongoing adult and youth classes. Our expert instructors guide you through the techniques of **traditional archery**, emphasizing form, focus, and history. For those looking for a social shooting experience, our popular **Friday night Open Range** sessions offer a welcoming atmosphere for all skill levels. Visit **Lykopis Archery** today to discover a timeless discipline and join a community dedicated to the historical mastery of the bow in British Columbia.
business_hours: Shop: Mon/Tue/Thu/Fri 10:30-5:30; Open Range: Fri 6:30-8:30 PM
lesson_price_range: Traditional/Historical archery lessons; Private $90-$160
